name: Tuscan Grilled Summer Vegetables
keywords: basil, bell pepper, dry red wine, eggplant, orange, patty pan squash, rosemary, sage, summer squash, tomatoes, white eggplant, zucchini, low calorie, low-sodium, vegan, vegetarian, side dish, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 white eggplant, 1/2 pound, sliced into 2-inch-thick rounds
2 summer squash, cut into 2-inch-thick slices, lengthwise
2 patty pan squash, cut into 2-inch-thick slices
3 large, ripe tomatoes, cut into 2-inch-thick slices
1 yellow bell pepper, seeded, deveined, cut into 2-inch-wide slices, lengthwise
1 red bell pepper, seeded, deveined, cut into 2-inch-wide slices, lengthwise
1 medium red onion, peeled, sliced into 1/2-inch-thick rounds

recipeInstructions.text: Put eggplant, zucchini and squash in a colander. Add salt. Toss and set aside to drain for 30 minutes. Rinse, pat dry and place in a large, shallow glass or ceramic dish. Add the remaining vegetables and basil. Cover with the Tuscan marinade. Refrigerate for 8 hours, turning once. Grill over hot coals until tender, about 5 to 10 minutes per side.
